name: Akash Kottil
bio:
Hi there! 👋
I'm Akash Kottil, a self-taught MERN stack developer from India. I thrive on turning innovative ideas into high-quality, user-friendly Web Apps

Tinker-Anniversary.summary: Recent activities in Tinker-Anniversary repository include refining user experience through added scrolling animation and a loader, along with resolving issues.

lava-ott.summary: The lava-ott repository has seen improvement in security through the addition of a security wrapper.

npm-package.summary: The npm-package repository initiated its development with its first commit, laying the foundation for future progress.

profile_summary:
Akash Kottil is a highly skilled and innovative MERN stack developer renowned for transforming visionary concepts into intuitive, high-quality web applications. Proficient in JavaScript and CSS, Akash brings a unique set of technical skills to the table, honed through extensive experience in designing and developing seamless user experiences. With a strong presence on GitHub, Akash has amassed a network of followers and boasts an impressive portfolio of 26 public repositories, testament to their dedication and expertise.

As a self-taught developer, Akash embodies the spirit of innovation and adaptability, consistently pushing the boundaries of what is possible in web development. With a proven track record of delivering user-friendly, high-performance solutions, Akash has established themselves as a reliable and results-driven professional, driven by a passion for turning creative ideas into reality. With expertise spanning the full MERN stack, Akash is an invaluable asset to any project, bringing a wealth of knowledge and technical prowess to the table.
